item.title: About
item.description: I am a machine learning engineer currently focused on building self-driving cars at Cruise. Past includes: Stanford B.S./M.S. in Computer Science, MLE @ LinkedIn, and a lot of water polo. 2019 - Present I am an ML Engineer at Cruise, where I have worked on two primary domains: trajectory prediction and trajectory planning. I spent the first couple of years here focused on trajectory prediction. You can see some highlights in this blog post.
